author: Mark Manson
description:
Oh and if you want to read the guide to any of these, use my favorite book summary service Shortform. Go to shortform.com/markmanson and get 20% off.

I’ve read over 1,000 non-fiction books in my lifetime and today I’ve summarized 22 of the most impactful ones I’ve ever come across.

We've got a range of topics from business to relationships to plain old happiness, so there's something for everyone. Dive in. 

FREE: For practical advice each week that might change your life, sign up for my newsletter here: http://bit.ly/3JRg3NX

If you are not already a member of my premium community, get access to monthly challenges and daily action steps that add up to real change here: https://mrk.mn/ZcFwvxv

Oh yeah, and I’m Mark Manson, 3x #1 NY Times bestselling author of:
The Subtle Art of Not Giving a Fck - https://mrk.mn/3svfxcu
Everything Is Fcked: A Book About Hope - https://mrk.mn/2RNxVAD

Other places I share useful wisdom you won’t hate:
INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/markmanson/

title: 22 Life-Changing Books Summarized in 28 Minutes
